2023-12-8.flavor: This exquisite Geisha coffee offers a delicate balance of floral aromas and fruity notes, complemented by a smooth, velvety texture and a lingering, sophisticated finish.

2023-12-7.flavor: A harmonious blend of nutty flavors with a touch of caramel sweetness, balanced by a mild fruity acidity.

2023-12-6.flavor: Earthy and spicy, with a robust body and a lingering aftertaste of dark chocolate.

2023-12-5.flavor: Rich and full-bodied with notes of chocolate and a smooth, velvety finish.

2023-12-4.flavor: Vibrant and aromatic, featuring a lively interplay of berry-like flavors and a refreshing acidity.

2023-12-3.flavor: Bold and intense, with a heavy body and a pronounced earthy character.

2023-12-2.flavor: This coffee offers a delicate dance of floral aromatics, bright citrus notes, and a graceful undertone of honeyed chocolate.

2023-12-1.flavor: Coffee tantalizes the palate with a rich symphony of bold bitterness, subtle acidity, and a hint of roasted sweetness.
